com.webcheckers.ui.HtmlRoutes

Class PostSelectOpponentRoute

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.webcheckers.ui.HtmlRoutes.PostSelectOpponentRoute
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    spark.Route

    public class PostSelectOpponentRoute
extends java.lang.Object
implements spark.Route
    The POST /selectOpponent route handler. This is the page where the user starts.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PostSelectOpponentRoute

        public PostSelectOpponentRoute(GameCenter gameCenter,
                               PlayerLobby playerLobby,
                               spark.TemplateEngine templateEngine)
        Create the Spark Route (UI controller) for the POST /selectOpponent HTTP request.
        Parameters:
        gameCenter - the GameCenter for tracking all ongoing games
        playerLobby - the PlayerLobby for tracking all signed in players
        templateEngine - the TemplateEngine used for rendering page HTML.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - when the gameCenter, playerLobby, or templateEngine parameter is null

    • Method Detail

      • handle

        public java.lang.Object handle(spark.Request request,
                               spark.Response response)
        Render the WebCheckers GameState page or the Home page, depending on whether the selected opponent is already in a game or not.
        Specified by:
        handle in interface spark.Route
        Parameters:
        request - the HTTP request
        response - the HTTP response
        Returns:
        the rendered HTML for the game page
